pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Texture Styling Cream 85Ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Texture Styling Texturising Cream Extra Strong Hold protects the hair from drying out.

- Edgy, dishevelled styles for textured looks.

- 48H extra strong hold & care formula.

- Lightweight, without stickiness & easy to brush out.

Texture Styling.

Textured Finish. Dishevelled Styled.

48h hold & care formula.

Size: 85mL

Ingredients

Aqua, Cera Alba, VP/VA Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Palmitic Acid, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Steareth-2, Steareth-21, Propylene Glycol, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Cera Microcristallina, Parfum, Paraffin, Limonene, Aminomethyl Propanol, Methylparaben, Carbomer, Ethylparaben, Linalool, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Citral.

Directions

Cover fingertips with cream, rub between palm and work into dry hair. Focus on roots and ends for defined texture.
